name: Mindful Meerkats
tagline: Mirror your life in the eyes of a meerkat
body: ### Mindful Meerkats An upcoming smartphone game to mirror your life in the eyes of a meerkat. ### News #MindfulMeerkats Tweets ### Authors and Contributors Mindful Meerkats is currently being created by a group of Sustainable Development students at Utrecht University with the help marvellous programmers. We welcome anyone to join us and help making real Mindful Meerkats. ### Support or Contact Get in touch with us, write us an email to [mindful-meerkats@posteo.de](mailto:mindful-meerkats@posteo.de) or tweet to us at [@MindfulMeerkats](https://twitter.com/MindfulMeerkat).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
